#summary Platform Independent NPAPI (Pepper)

= Introduction =

We're working on an effort we call Pepper.  It's a set of modifications to NPAPI to make plugins more portable and more secure.  We have proposed the first part of the API and are preparing a more detailed version for formal submission.


= Details =

You can read the working proposal on the Mozilla wiki: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Plugins:PlatformIndependentNPAPI.  We look forward to your comments.
